name: Jellyfin
description: Media server. Organizes, displays, and plays media of all sorts

name: Sonarr
description: TV Show collection tracker. Tracks releases and manages finding torrents, sends them to qBittorrent, and hands the downloaded file to Jellyfin once complete

name: Radarr
description: Movie collection tracker. Tracks releases and manages finding torrents, sends them to qBittorrent, and hands the downloaded file to Jellyfin once complete

name: Prowlarr
description: an indexer manager/proxy built on the popular arr .net/reactjs base stack to integrate with various PVR apps.
